topic.title: Step 6 - Setting up the first user account
topic.p: Complete all of your details on this page, ensuring that you follow each of the instructions next to the field names.
topic.note: Unlike Mingle in the cloud, Mingle onsite does not require password formats by default. However, you can require a password format by setting the "password_format" parameter in Mingle's auth_config.yml file. This setting will enforce a requirement of at least 5 characters, including a number and a symbol character.

screenshot.alttext: Set up the first user account

topic.p: Click the Continue button. Then Mingle will display the Import project templates page.
